Class ExpandableWrapper<P extends Parent<C>,C>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.bignerdranch.expandablerecyclerview.model.ExpandableWrapper<P,C>
  • Type Parameters:
    P - Parent list item
    C - Child list item

    public class ExpandableWrapper<P extends Parent<C>,C>
extends java.lang.Object
    Wrapper used to link metadata with a list item.
